name: “Knowledge Is Helpful” Hanamaru Kunikida
expansion: [EX] Love Live! School idol festival Series 10th Anniversary
ability: 【AUTO】 When your character's trigger check reveals a climax, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.

【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, choose up to 1 yellow character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavor_text:
I brought a bunch of books, zura!
Thought they'd be nice for spending the night.

name: Fallen Angel Rain, Yoshiko Tsushima
expansion: [EX] Love Live! School idol festival Series 10th Anniversary
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +500 power until end of turn.

【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may put the top card of your deck into your waiting room. If that card is a 《Music》 character, you may move this card to an open position of your center stage.
flavor_text: I feel like I can still enjoy myself if I'm with you! Let's go, little demon!

name: I Hope My Prayers Reach You♪ Hanamaru Kunikida
expansion: [EX] Love Live! School idol festival Series 10th Anniversary
ability: 【CONT】 During your turn, all of your other 《Music》 characters get +1000 power.
【ACT】 [(2) 【REST】 this card] Look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavor_text: A sweets buffet... I can eat as many sweets as I want during our time slot? This is paradise, zura!

name: “Ruby-Approved” Ruby Kurosawa
expansion: [EX] Love Live! School idol festival Series 10th Anniversary
ability: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", put X cards from the top of your opponent's deck into their waiting room. X is equal to the number of 《Music》 characters you have.

【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 3000, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn)
flavor_text:
This book, it's written on how to raise birds easily,
and it was super helpful!

name: Your Lap Looks So Comfy! Ruby Kurosawa
expansion: [EX] Love Live! School idol festival Series 10th Anniversary
ability: 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each of your other 《Music》 characters.

【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavor_text: H-Here! It might not be very good, but I knitted you a scarf!

name: “Creation of a Minion” Yoshiko Tsushima
expansion: [EX] Love Live! School idol festival Series 10th Anniversary
ability: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When "MIRAI TICKET" is placed on your climax area, this card gets +2000 power and the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room."

【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. During the turn that this card is placed on the stage from your hand, when damage dealt by this card is canceled, put the top card of your deck into your waiting room, and deal X damage to your opponent. X is equal to the level of that card +1. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Damage may be canceled)
flavor_text: Fallen Angel Yohane will definitely bring forth her faithful minion!

name: Full Speed Ahead! You Watanabe
expansion: [EX] Love Live! School idol festival Series 10th Anniversary
ability: 【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, return all cards from your waiting room to your deck, and shuffle your deck.
flavor_text: I haven't either. I'm really excited to try, though! Well, here we go!

name: “Chirp Chirp Melody” Riko Sakurauchi
expansion: [EX] Love Live! School idol festival Series 10th Anniversary
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your 《Music》 or 《Animal》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.
【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 1 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character.
flavor_text: Huh, I hear a sound coming from the egg...!?

name: Aiming for the Heart♪ Chika Takami
expansion: [EX] Love Live! School idol festival Series 10th Anniversary
ability: 【CONT】 If the character facing this card is cost 0 or lower, this card gets +1 level and +3500 power.
flavor_text: Isn't this place amazing? All those oranges and blues from the sky blend together with the sea as it glimmers along the horizon.

name: “Sharing Our Strength” You Watanabe
expansion: [EX] Love Live! School idol festival Series 10th Anniversary
ability: 【CONT】 If the character facing this card is cost 0 or lower, this card cannot become 【REVERSE】.
flavor_text:
Egg check - good to go!
Egg turning, check!
Temperature and humidity...

name: “It's Alive!” Chika Takami
expansion: [EX] Love Live! School idol festival Series 10th Anniversary
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a level 0 or lower character, put it into your stock. (Otherwise, return it to its original place)
【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if the character facing this card is level 3 or higher, this card gets +6000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: I read that talking to eggs makes them friendly when they hatch. Let's send good vibes for a healthy birth!

name: Waiting for You, Riko Sakurauchi
expansion: [EX] Love Live! School idol festival Series 10th Anniversary
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Music》 characters you have ×500.

【AUTO】 [【REST】 1 of your 【STAND】 characters] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, your opponent chooses 1 climax in their waiting room, returns all cards from their waiting room except that card to their deck, and shuffles their deck.
【ACT】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] Choose 1 of your 《Music》 characters, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: Oh wow, thank you! I'll bring some of my favorite sheet music next time we meet up, too.

name: “Renewed Feelings” Dia Kurosawa
expansion: [EX] Love Live! School idol festival Series 10th Anniversary
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Music》 character, put it into your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. (Otherwise, return it to its original place)
【AUTO】 [(1) Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, draw 1 card.
flavor_text: *Giggle* Well then, I'll start by telling you about my beloved little sister.

name: Shall We Dance? Mari Ohara
expansion: [EX] Love Live! School idol festival Series 10th Anniversary
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have 2 or more other 《Music》 characters, you may draw 1 card. If you do, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.

【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 《Music》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavor_text: Don't worry♪ You shouldn't forget that you have me with you. I'll be there to back you up if anything happens♪

name: Our Little Secret, Kanan Matsuura
expansion: [EX] Love Live! School idol festival Series 10th Anniversary
ability: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", if you have a 《Music》 character, choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.

【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 1000, Level 1 [Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn)
flavor_text: I get to do something I love with you. I've gone stargazing many times, but the sky I'm looking at now is the most beautiful of all. I'll never forget it.

name: “Let's Have a Chat” Mari Ohara
expansion: [EX] Love Live! School idol festival Series 10th Anniversary
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top or at the bottom of your deck.
【AUTO】 When this card attacks, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of your other 《Music》 characters ×1000.

【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 2 or higher, you may return this card to your hand. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Return the revealed card to its original place)
flavor_text: If we're taking a break... how about we talk to the egg?

name: Lipstick Kiss, Dia Kurosawa
expansion: [EX] Love Live! School idol festival Series 10th Anniversary
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have another 《Music》 character, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn.

【AUTO】 [(1) 【REST】 1 of your other 【STAND】 《Music》 characters] During the turn that this card is placed on the stage from your hand, when this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 《Music》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavor_text: Mmm♪ Yes, it really is divine. H-However... I am embarrassed beyond words.

name: “A Spring Sea Breeze” Kanan Matsuura
expansion: [EX] Love Live! School idol festival Series 10th Anniversary
ability: 【CONT】 Assist All of your level 3 or higher characters in front of this card get +2000 power.
【ACT】 [【REST】 2 of your 《Music》 characters] Draw 1 card, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.
flavor_text: *Giggle* Once we've decided on the path to move forward, all that's left is to go there together, right?
